author: KC
text:
Hello everyone,
Today my family said goodbye to my Dad after many years of putting up a good fight, sad to see him leave but happy to know he’s no longer suffering. 
If you can help in any way my family would greatly appreciate it ❤️ https://t.co/dhEyz6dOFc

author: KC
text: Mayor Jacob Frey: Justice for George Floyd - Sign the Petition! https://t.co/Cs5hw7uur0 via @Change

text: Waka Waka by Shakira is still the best World Cup song idc what y’all say!

author: KC
text: Whoever stole my jacket at the bar your mom is a hoe!

author: KC
text: When people abuse animals it breaks my heart so fucking much! Let someone do that shit to you see how you like it! I can never fully watch those videos without feeling like I’m gonna throw up!

author: KC
text: No one ever made a difference by being like everyone else.

author: KC
text: You should care less about who you offend and more about who you inspire.

author: KC
text: I love when people tell me I can't! Because I can and I will! 😎🤷🏽‍♂️

author: KC
text: Having friends you can have deep conversations with and just vibe out that's what it's all about! 😎 you a real one @Eric_mercado15
